content.raw:
the inconcistent wrapping doesn't show up when rendered on sdformat.org:

* http://sdformat.org/tutorials?tut=install&ver=6.x&branch=install6#BuildAndInstallSDFormat

I didn't realize bitbucket rendered all the line breaks. I find the diffs easier to read when lines are shorter, and since sdformat.org looks ok, I'm going to keep it this way, but if there is a different markdown renderer that we want to prioritize, I'll reformat the tutorials as necessary.
